segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a young boy climbing on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet, right for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is clearly labeled 'COOKIE JAR' and it's full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's holding a plate too, probably to catch his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, almost about to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is quite impressive, though, I must admit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And look, his sister is there, reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly a willing accomplice in this cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the danger of that stool tipping over is really bothering me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their prize, just like the woman is on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such focused mischief makes me smile, despite the inherent risk.
segments.speaker: PAR
